trans-unit.source: The phrases are all already updated

trans-unit.source: This is an unofficial app for The Big Bang Theory fans. All trademarks and copyrights are property of CBS.
trans-unit.target: This is an unofficial app for The Big Bang Theory fans. All trademarks and copyrights are property of CBS.

trans-unit.source: For the first launch, I need an internet connection to download the new sounds
trans-unit.target: For the first launch, I need an internet connection to download the new sounds

trans-unit.source: Something is missing in this app? Please send us your suggestions, we definitely consider your feedback! Open the About Page and drop us a line by mail, Twitter or Facebook.
trans-unit.target: Something is missing in this app? Please send us your suggestions, we definitely consider your feedback! Open the About Page and drop us a line by mail, Twitter or Facebook.

trans-unit.source: Whoops! There is something wrong with the connection to the server... Try again in a few minutes. If still doesn't work, please contact me on Facebook (WP Mobile Entertainment)
trans-unit.target: Whoops! There is something wrong with the connection to the server... Try again in a few minutes. If still doesn't work, please contact me on Facebook (WP Mobile Entertainment)

trans-unit.source: I'm sorry, but you have to be connected to internet to download the sounds. Close, connect to internet, and reopen the app.
trans-unit.target: I'm sorry, but you have to be connected to internet to download the sounds. Close, connect to internet, and reopen the app.

trans-unit.source: Yeah, not you can listen to new Sheldon's famous phrases!
trans-unit.target: Yeah, not you can listen to new Sheldon's famous phrases!

trans-unit.source: Hey, there are new sounds available, do you want to download them?
trans-unit.target: Hey, there are new sounds available, do you want to download them?

trans-unit.source: Set every sound as Ringtone by long-pressing on the buttons!
trans-unit.target: Set every sound as Ringtone by long-pressing on the buttons!

trans-unit.source: Do you want to stop your music and hear what Sheldon have to say?
trans-unit.target: Do you want to stop your music and hear what Sheldon have to say?
